long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Now images are everywhere, they take space but rarely do they contain any useful information. Some websites look better without worthless illustrations and ads.
 
Use this extension to hide images, videos and iframes with ads. Once you click the extensionâ€™s icon, it will keep removing images in all the pages loaded from the same host. If you reload the page or open in a new window, images will be automatically removed. The images get hidden reversibly. Click again to enable images. If you click again, images will get hidden again. 

The extension works also in pages with an infinite scroll, it monitors the page and removes gradually loaded img, video and iframe tags.

Some pages get smaller without images, but in most heights or content blocks are specified in the HTML layout.
